body_html:
I used git checkout 0.2.1 to get bazel, should I upgrade using git checkout 0.3.1 or is there a different method you'd recommend.

Using git checkout 0.3.1 gives me:

 error: Your local changes to the following files would be overwritten by checkout:
        scripts/bootstrap/compile.sh
Please, commit your changes or stash them before you can switch branches.
Aborting

body:
I used `git checkout 0.2.1` to get bazel, should I upgrade using `git checkout 0.3.1` or is there a different method you'd recommend. 

Using `git checkout 0.3.1` gives me:

```
 error: Your local changes to the following files would be overwritten by checkout:
        scripts/bootstrap/compile.sh
Please, commit your changes or stash them before you can switch branches.
Aborting

```
